original_text: Yet there are some of you who do not believe.” For Jesus had known from the beginning which of them did not believe and who would betray him.
korean_text: 그러나 너희 중에 믿지 아니하는 자들이 있느니라 하시니 이는 예수께서 믿지 아니하는 자들이 누구며 자기를 팔 자가 누구인지 처음부터 아심이러라

sentences.original_text: Yet there are some of you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희 중에 어떤 이들이 있다

sentences.original_text: For Jesus had known from the beginning
which of them did not believe
